/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the cityscape. The street, filled with a variety of vehicles including cars and trucks, stretches out into the distance, flanked by towering buildings on either side. These structures, predominantly white and gray, rise high into the sky, punctuated by occasional splashes of red and green. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds. The image is taken from a low angle, emphasizing the height of the buildings and the expanse of the sky.
